rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows for natural light and ventilation; designed to face the garden.
Adjacent to the living room for a seamless flow; features large openings and natural ventilation.
Private guest room with ample natural light; oriented to maximize morning sunlight.
Additional guest room with a focus on privacy and natural ventilation; designed to incorporate Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance with eco-friendly materials and wide openings for enhanced ventilation.
Secondary opening leading to the large garden area; supports natural light and fresh air circulation.

additional_features.description: Expansive garden space designed for sustainability and relaxation with native plants and water harvesting systems.
Integrated system to collect and store rainwater for eco-friendly water usage.
Solar panels installed on the roof to support renewable energy generation.
